Text:
Nordic release also includes finnish subs...
I hate to see releases that has subtitles removed.

Keep in mind that others than swedish leechers would like to have subtitles on their own language too!!!

UPDATE: This release do in fact include ENG,DK,NO,FI,SE,IT,HINDI subs.

So now i'm asking, what kind of dumbass uploads torrent and puts only swedish subs in info screen?!?!?
